subsection.text: One of the fundamental objectives 6of NASA aeronautics research is the steady progression 7and expansion of high-speed flight research and capabili 8ties, including the science and technology of critical under 9lying disciplines and competencies, the most important of 10which are computational-based analytical and predictive 11tools and methodologies, aero thermodynamics, high-speed 12flight propulsion, high-temperature structures and mate 13rials, and flight controls.
